mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter from Jennie Howard to Dr. Thomas H. Howard Dated August 7, 1858
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A letter dated August 7, 1858 from Jennie Howard to her brother in law in Floyd County Virginia, Dr. Thomas H. Howard. The letter relays bad news about failing crops in Campbellton Georgia, and gives a general update about the well being and whereabouts of relatives.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Crops
Farm crops
Health
Health & welfare
Personal health
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
